name: The revenant fox
description:
Hello world!

This game is a Ghost-Fox-Adventure.

Music and sounds volumes can't be modified :|
On web, click one time on the game if your keyboard doesn't work.

Use ZQSD, WASD or arrows to move. 
UP, Z, W or space to jump.
Escape to pause.
R to reload the level.

Gaetan Depin - Developer
Axel Virot - Developer (Vivite)
Ansimuz - Assets - Itch.io
Pascal Belisle - Music

Patch: Key mapping for QWERTY, mapping of SPACE

Enjoy!
